short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your favorite restaurant to your kitchen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yelp's Recipes is a way to extend your experience on Yelp's restaurant pages. During your navigation, every time you are on a restaurant page you will see videos of recipes related to that restaurant's kitchen.

You just have to install the extension and it's done! Every time you are in a restaurant page you will see the recipes.

This an open source extension, you can see the code and fork it on github: https://github.com/andregumieri/vanhackathon-broadbandtv
